titles.title: Encouraging people in the United States to recognize March 2, 2017, as Read Across America Day.
Encouraging people in the United States to recognize March 2, 2017, as Read Across America Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Honors Theodor Geisel (Dr. Seuss) for his success in encouraging children to discover the joy of reading.
Honors the 20th anniversary of Read Across America Day.
Encourages parents to read with their children for at least 30 minutes on Read Across America Day.
